info.title: Warehouse Physical Inventory (A2X)
info.description:
In every API call, you can make use of the following operations:
 - Retrieve physical inventory (PI) items.
 - Count PI items.
 - Change counted PI items.
 - Mark PI items as ***Deleted***.

You can integrate this API with external applications.

For the counting PI items and changing counted PI items operations, you can only perform these operations using batch requests. Additionally, you must include the entities ***Warehouse Physical Inventory Item ***(<TT>WhsePhysicalInventoryItem</TT>) and ***Warehouse Physical Inventory Count Item*** (<TT>WhsePhysicalInventoryCountItem</TT>) in the batch requests.

x-sap-shortText: Count physical inventory using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [Standalone Warehousing â€“ Physical Inventory(6VG)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/6VG " Link To BP ")

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*
